WRITING.TITLE: He's very persistent. How do I tell someone I'm not interested?

WRITING.TEXT: Yeah I realised that after. I always try to give someone a chance cause I realise that it's hard at first! I'm the same, though I will never write just Hi, it is hard.
Yep I know I saw it after I posted to imgur but couldn't be bothered to change it.

WRITING.TITLE: Got this today - Struggling to make conversation then promise of dirty talk.. nice.
